titleStmt.title: John Boyle to J. W. White
CWG13911

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 3 ; 9 April - 25 May 1864

body.p:
46
April 16th 4
Dr. J. W White
Lancaster Ohio
Dr.

Your communication of blank date, addressed to his Excellency Gov Bramlette, has been referred to this office for reply. I have the honor to state, that commissions as asst surgeons in Ky regiments, are only issued upon the recommendation of the colonels commanding same.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
